locations.address: 430 W Warner Rd Ste 108, Tempe, AZ 85284

painPoints: Manual 'shopping around' for rates with multiple carriers
Spam email issues mentioned in reviews (automation quality control needed)
automationAngles: Automated quoting engine for standard policies
Online quote request forms with automated follow-up
Email marketing automation (to fix spam issues)
CRM integration for multi-location client management

trustScore.websiteQualityNotes: Professional but basic WordPress site, mobile-responsive but could be more functional
trustScore.reviewsNotes: 4.8 stars with 224 reviews on Birdeye. Good reputation. Some minor complaints about spam email frequency.
trustScore.competitorSaturationNotes: Low-medium competition for small agency automation
trustScore.clearPositioningNotes: Clear value prop 'We shop around to get the best rates', targeted at personal and business insurance
trustScore.effortScoreNotes: Easy outreach - public contact info, small team, decision-maker likely accessible

opportunityNotes: Strong automation opportunity in quoting process, multi-state operations create complexity, reputation is good but operations appear manual

decisionMaker.name: Charlotte (Principal Agent)
decisionMaker.notes: Charlotte mentioned prominently in reviews as key decision-maker
